doc:
Ève Francis https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/%C3%88ve_Francis 0 Ève Francis (20 August 1886 – 6 December 1980) was an actress and film-maker. She was born in Belgium but spent most of her career in France. She became closely associated with the writer Paul Claudel, and she was married to the critic and film-maker Louis Delluc. Ève_Francis ( 20_August_1886 – 6_December_1980 ) was an_actress_and_film-maker . She was_born in Belgium but spent most of her_career in France . She became closely_associated with the_writer_Paul_Claudel , and she was_married to the_critic_and_film-maker_Louis_Delluc .
